snippet: Argentina winger Angel Di Maria trained lightly on Thursday in the hope of being able to play a part in the World Cup final against Germany on Sunday despite suffering a thigh injury just days ago....

headline.print_headline: Argentina's Di Maria Trains in Hope of Making Final
headline.main: Argentina's Di Maria Trains in Hope of Making Final

lead_paragraph: Argentina winger Angel Di Maria trained lightly on Thursday in the hope of being able to play a part in the World Cup final against Germany on Sunday despite suffering a thigh injury just days ago.
